text: #Chloroquine study in #Brazil is HALTED after 11 patients out of 81 die from DEADLY arrhythmias (Prolonged Q-T Interval) It's unethical and illegal to do LD-50 (Lethal Dose) studies here in US, yet our mentally ill president, @realDonaldTrump , demands it. #25thAmendment https://t.co/HowNvUKSlG
